sentences.english: Moliere, the French playwright wrote a play called Tartuffe.
sentences.chinese: 法国剧作家莫里哀写了一本剧作《答尔丢夫》。

sentences.english: Of all the French writers that I have read, I like Molière and Racine best.
sentences.chinese: 在我所拜读过的法国作家中，我最喜欢莫里哀和拉辛。

sentences.english: He acted in two plays by Molière.
sentences.chinese: 他在莫里哀编的两个剧中扮演角色。

sentences.english: Though he is best known as a playwright, Molière never stopped acting.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他是最有名的剧作家，莫里哀从未停止代理。
